summary.span: 表示一个文档查看控件，该控件可以承载分页的 内容，例如 。

span.span: Represents a document viewing control that can host paginated content such as an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 自定义 DocumentViewer 控件Customizing the DocumentViewer Control 若要将相同的属性设置应用于多个控件，使用属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 你可以修改默认提供独特外观的控件。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的部件和特定于状态，请参阅[DocumentViewer 样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/documentviewer-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [DocumentViewer Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/documentviewer-styles-and-templates.md). 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 设置 visual 属性会仅造成影响该属性是否都存在于控件的默认模板，并通过设置。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 可以在的"更改 Visual 结构的控件"一节中找到的可视属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).

summary.span: 将文档内容缩小一个缩放级别。

span.span: Zooms out of the document content by one zoom step.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下是缩放级别增量。The following are the zoom level increments. `5% 100% 1200%` `10% 125% 1600%` `25% 150% 2000%` `33% 175% 2400%` `50% 200% 3200%` `66% 300% 4000%` `75% 400% 5000%` `800%` 最小缩放级别为 5%。The minimum zoom level is 5%. 达到最小缩放级别后，已不再起作用。After the minimum zoom level is reached, has no more effect. 属性返回`false`当达到最小缩放级别。The property returns `false` when the minimum zoom level is reached.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ExtentHeight As Double
public: property double ExtentHeight { double get(); };

summary.span: 获取分页文档的整体垂直高度。

span.span: Gets the overall vertical height of the paginated document.

value.span: 以与设备无关的像素指定的分页内容的整体垂直高度。

span.span: The overall vertical height of the paginated content specified in device independent pixels.

value.span: 默认值为 0.0。

span.span: The default is 0.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于垂直页面布局是所有页面高度的总数，包括页面之间的间距。For vertical page arrangements, is the sum of all the page heights and includes the space between pages. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double HorizontalOffset { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置水平滚动条位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal scroll position.

value.span: 采用与设备无关的像素指定的当前水平滚动位置。

span.span: The current horizontal scroll position specified in device independent pixels.

value.span: 初始默认值是 0.0。

span.span: The initial default is 0.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性会导致控件滚动到指定的水平偏移量。Setting the property causes the control to scroll to the specified horizontal offset. 水平偏移量被指从可见的内容区域的左边缘。The horizontal offset is measured from the left edge of the visible content area. 设置此属性时[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，不能使用的单位限定符 (如`in`或`cm`) 启用的许多其他"宽度"或"水平"属性。When setting this property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], you cannot use the unit qualifiers (such as `in` or `cm`) that are enabled for many other "Width" or "Horizontal" properties. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为**true**Metadata properties set to **true**||

span.span: The value specified to set is negative.

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal space between pages.

value.span: 所显示页面之间的水平间距，以与设备无关的像素为单位。

span.span: The horizontal space between displayed pages specified in device independent pixels.

value.span: 默认值为 10.0。

span.span: The default is 10.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性调整页面之间的水平间距。Setting the property adjusts the horizontal spacing between pages. 设置此属性时[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，不能使用的单位限定符 (如`in`或`cm`) 启用的许多其他"宽度"或"水平"属性。When setting this property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], you cannot use the unit qualifiers (such as `in` or `cm`) that are enabled for many other "Width" or "Horizontal" properties. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

span.span: The value specified to set is negative.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowPageBorders { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否显示阴影页边框。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether drop-shadow page borders are displayed.

value.span: 如果显示落地阴影边框，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if drop-shadow borders are displayed; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double VerticalOffset { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置垂直滚动条的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the vertical scroll position.

value.span: 当前垂直滚动条的位置偏移量，以与设备无关的像素为单位。

span.span: The current vertical scroll position offset in device independent pixels.

value.span: 默认值为 0.0。

span.span: The default is 0.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须设置为非负的偏移量值。 must be set with non-negative offset values. 设置为负值将引发异常。Setting a negative value raises an exception. 垂直偏移量是根据可见的内容区域的顶部距离。The vertical offset is measured from the top of the visible content area. 设置此属性时[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，不能使用的单位限定符 (如`in`或`cm`) 启用的许多其他"高度"或"垂直"的属性。When setting this property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], you cannot use the unit qualifiers (such as `in` or `cm`) that are enabled for many other "Height" or "Vertical" properties. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty VerticalOffsetProperty
Public Shared ReadOnly VerticalOffsetProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 标识 依赖项属性。

span.span: Identifies the dependency property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double VerticalPageSpacing { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置显示页面之间的垂直间距。

span.span: Gets or sets the vertical spacing between displayed pages.

value.span: 显示页面之间的垂直间距，以与设备无关的像素为单位。

span.span: The vertical space between displayed pages in device independent pixels.

value.span: 默认值为 10.0。

span.span: The default is 10.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性调整为指定的值的页面之间的垂直间距。Setting the property adjusts the vertical spacing between pages to the specified value. 值必须为非负数。The value must be non-negative. 将此属性设置为负值将引发异常。Setting this property to a negative value will raise an exception. 设置此属性时[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，不能使用的单位限定符 (如`in`或`cm`) 启用的许多其他"高度"或"垂直"的属性。When setting this property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], you cannot use the unit qualifiers (such as `in` or `cm`) that are enabled for many other "Height" or "Vertical" properties. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

summary.span: 获取执行 操作的 。

span.span: Gets the that performs the operation.

value.span: 执行 操作的路由命令。

span.span: The routed command that performs the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大小和布局视图以显示每个页面的缩略图预览。 sizes and arranges the view to display a thumbnail preview of each page. 下表显示使用此命令关联的键盘快捷键。The following table shows the keyboard shortcut key associated with this command. ||| |-|-| |快捷键Shortcut Key|[无][none]|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Zoom { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置文档缩放百分比。

span.span: Gets or sets the document zoom percentage.

value.span: 缩放百分比表示为 5.0 到 5000.0 之间的一个值。

span.span: The zoom percentage expressed as a value, 5.0 to 5000.0.
The default is 100.0, which corresponds to 100.0%.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性会导致控件缩放到指定的值。Setting this property causes the control to zoom to the specified value. 属性必须为介于的形式 （含） 之间的值对应于百分比范围 5.0%到 5000.0%。The property must be a value between 5.0 to 5000.0 (inclusive), which corresponds to a percentage range 5.0% to 5000.0%. 操作或需要的布局更新的命令可能会更改属性设置。Actions or commands that require a layout update may change the property setting. 例如，更改的值，则调用方法，或调用可能会导致设置更改。For example, changing the value of , calling the method, or invoking the can cause the setting to change. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||
